# ✨ Features Showcase

`ZestTextbox` isn't just another input field; it's crafted to bring a smile to your users' faces while providing robust functionality and a seamless developer experience. This section offers a high-level overview of `ZestTextbox`'s compelling features. For detailed usage and step-by-step guides, refer to [The Cookbook](./examples.md).

---

---

### Playful & Corporate Design

**Value Proposition:** Create input fields that are both professional and engaging, enhancing user interaction without compromising on a sleek, modern aesthetic. `ZestTextbox` strikes a unique balance, making everyday data entry a more pleasant experience.

```jsx
// A ZestTextbox with its default delightful styling.
<ZestTextbox placeholder="Enter your zest here!" />
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Basic Text Input](./examples.md#recipe-1-basic-text-input-hello-world)

---

### Centralized Configuration

**Value Proposition:** Effortlessly manage consistent behavior and styling across all `ZestTextbox` instances in your application. Define global defaults that can be easily overridden, simplifying maintenance and ensuring brand consistency.

```jsx
// Example of setting a global default zSize using ZestTextboxConfigProvider
import { ZestTextboxConfigProvider } from 'jattac.libs.web.zest-textbox';

const App = () => (
  <ZestTextboxConfigProvider value={{ zSize: "lg" }}>
    <MyForm />
  </ZestTextboxConfigProvider>
);
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Centralized Configuration (coming soon!)](./configuration.md) {/* Link to configuration guide for now */}

---

### Real-time Character Counter & Visual Progress Bar

**Value Proposition:** Provide instant, clear visual feedback on input length, guiding users to stay within limits and enhancing the form-filling experience. The progress bar offers an intuitive visual cue, while animated counters add a touch of delight.

```jsx
// A ZestTextbox with a character counter and animated progress bar
<ZestTextbox
  maxLength={50}
  placeholder="Max 50 characters"
  zest={{ showProgressBar: true, animatedCounter: true }}
/>
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Character Counter & Progress Bar](./examples.md#recipe-3-character-counter--progress-bar)

---

### Dynamic Helper Text

**Value Proposition:** Display context-aware messages, validation errors, or helpful tips that adapt dynamically based on user input, providing immediate and relevant guidance to the user.

```jsx
// A ZestTextbox with dynamic helper text
<ZestTextbox
  type="email"
  placeholder="Enter your email"
  zest={{
    helperTextConfig: {
      templater: (formatted, context) =>
        context.isValid ? "Looks good!" : context.validationMessage || "Please enter a valid email."
    }
  }}
/>
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Dynamic Helper Text with Advanced Formatting](./examples.md#recipe-9-dynamic-helper-text-with-advanced-formatting)

---

### Password Visibility Toggle

**Value Proposition:** Enhance both the security and usability of password input fields. Users can easily show or hide their input, preventing common typing errors and increasing confidence in their entered credentials.

```jsx
// A password input with an integrated visibility toggle
<ZestTextbox type="password" placeholder="Secure Password" />
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Password Input with Visibility Toggle](./examples.md#recipe-2-password-input-with-visibility-toggle)

---

### Type-Safe Input Parsing & Validation

**Value Proposition:** Ensure data integrity and provide clear, immediate feedback for complex input requirements. Define custom logic to transform raw string input into specific data types and validate against custom rules, empowering you to handle any data format.

```jsx
// Example using a custom parser and validator for a positive integer
import { InputParser, InputValidator } from 'jattac.libs.web.zest-textbox';

const myParser: InputParser<number> = (value) => parseInt(value) || undefined;
const myValidator: InputValidator<number> = (value) => value > 0 || "Must be positive";

<ZestTextbox
  type="number"
  placeholder="Enter positive number"
  zest={{ parser: myParser, validator: myValidator }}
/>
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Custom Parser & Validator](./examples.md#recipe-5-custom-parser--validator)

---

### Theme Awareness (Light/Dark/System)

**Value Proposition:** Seamlessly integrate `ZestTextbox` into any application theme. Automatically adapt to user system preferences or explicitly set light/dark modes, providing a consistent and comfortable visual experience across your application.

```jsx
// A ZestTextbox explicitly set to dark mode
<ZestTextbox zest={{ theme: "dark" }} placeholder="Dark Mode Input" />
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Theming (Light/Dark/System)](./examples.md#recipe-7-theming-lightdarksystem)

---

### Responsive Sizing & Layout

**Value Proposition:** Achieve flexible and adaptive form layouts with ease. Control the visual size of the textbox and allow it to stretch to fill its container, ensuring optimal presentation across various screen sizes and design requirements.

```jsx
// A large ZestTextbox that stretches to full width
<ZestTextbox zest={{ zSize: "lg", stretch: true }} placeholder="Large and Stretched" />
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Sizing](./examples.md#recipe-6-sizing)
[Learn more in The Cookbook: Full Width Stretching](./examples.md#recipe-10-full-width-stretching)

---

### Multiline Textarea Support

**Value Proposition:** Effortlessly switch between single-line input fields and multi-line text areas, accommodating diverse content entry needs without changing components.

```jsx
// A multiline ZestTextbox
<ZestTextbox zest={{ isMultiline: true }} rows={5} placeholder="Type your long message here..." />
```

[Learn more in The Cookbook: Multiline Textarea](./examples.md#recipe-8-multiline-textarea)
